Returns: an InputStream from which the response body can be accessed
Throws: if an I/O error occurs while getting the response body
getBody().Description: Returns the response body as an InputStream.

Returns: An immutable Map from response header field names to lists of field values. The status line has null as its field name.
Throws: if an I/O error occurs while getting the response headers
getHeaders().Description: Returns the response headers as a Map.

ClassDesc: Represent channels for retrieving resources from the ResponseCache. Instances of such a class provide an InputStream that returns the entity body, and also a getHeaders() method which returns the associated response headers.
